Name: Pipes Racer
About the game: Unlock new tracks as you achieve at least Silver rank on current one. Race against clock in Time Attack events on over 50 tracks. Control your character to avoid obstacles, get benefits from boosters, and shield against lasers. Play with friends either 'Against' or 'Time Attack' in Split-Screen or On-Line Multiplayer modes.
